content.detailedDescription:
I'm not crazy.I am only compelled to write because ive seen the same mufon show, on fayetville, like three times, the guy that failed the fbi lie detector. he is telling the truth.

i watched a plane at altitude, traced it across the sky for about 30 seconds to a point where the track was going behind a cloud. i was watching the light the whole time just thinking mentally (awww look at the lil space aliens up in the sky.) and as it went behind the cloud i said in my mind (bye bye lil space aliens.) it was late, i was camping, my wife asleep in tent. i was entertaining my mind.

after the light went behind the cloud it came back out on the same track very fast, about four inches at the tip of my finger then continued  to go back behind the cloud. i blinked my eyes like what!? i thought i must be seeing things. and the light went behind the cloud again. i laughed at my self, and the light came out again just as before then continued its track behind cloud again. i remember it made me feel good inside in a funny way saying no you are not seeing tnings.

this is the part i am compelled to tell you: i know what saw, and where i saw it, however, in my mind, i wonder was that really real? did i see that on tv?? something about the confusion in my mind does not seem,mine. (like when i remember the thoughts come ,but a tangle with other stuff, and stangly this is like not other confusion in my mind, like its not my confusion... and if i was taking a lie detector test im sure this confusion would show. anyway thier ya go, whatever.Smiles.

best regards, don
content.summary: Watched ufo, spoke to me affected my mind...?

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to dallas 
the object was very bright 
the fist thing i thought it was an airplane or a helicopter 
the object was pulsing diferente light colors, was moving to fast left to right, up and down
what it really reassured me this object wasn't from earth was when a took off leaving a trace going through some high clouds and diminishing in the sky then couple minutes later reappearing and hovering again in the same then taking off again and dessapearing 
i call my bf and sister to let them know what i just witnessed also called the spanish tv station univision in dallas but nobody answer at the number i called
after this event my sleeping experiences i had in the past make more sense
content.summary: Driving to dallas object was making drastic turns up and down deft to right then took off and diminish in the sky leaving a trace then comeback to the same place to do the same them diminish again

content.detailedDescription:
Cylinder shaped craft with bright diamond shaped light above

on december 18th 2006 at 12:17 p.M., i was driving on route #1 when i noticed what i initially thought to be an aircraft. i continued to observe it and it appeared to be missing wings and a tail . it also had a diamond shaped bright light above it. the craft was cylindrical in shape and silver-gray in color. i pulled over to the side of the road and took a photograph of the craft. i still do not know what it is or if it was even a craft. it remained in the same location for about two minutes. i was looking at my camera photo and when i looked back up in the sky, the craft was no longer there. photo available for identification purposes only.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped craft with bright diamond shaped light above stationary in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm retired usaf  a-10 crew chief , my story is not a unique one,as my story less the abduction is very similar to travis walton's except there is no abduction.  at that time i lived just outside the back gate of dmafb in arizona in a little apartment complex , well if you looked outside my apartment window you would see the aircraft graveyard, and there was a fence between the apartment and the base this is where i took my husky out to do her business each night . well it was this particular morning she was pestering me to go out at i would guess between three am and four am
so we proceded out to the back of the complex so she could go do her business. it was this particular evening that something caught my eye to the south i believe the ranges are called the santa rita's and north of those are called the rincon mountain range, to my amazement when i looked up i saw three fireballs and what i noticed was that the one in the front was larger than the other two which where half the main craft they were equally spaced and traveling intelligently across the night sky not going up and not going down even with the distance between us i could still see the flames dancing behind the craft as they were traveling horizontal to the earth . i would like to add that the direction they were headed was toward the white mountains 
i would also like to add that i do believe in ufo's and that the government know but will not tell anyone because of what will happen to the planet
content.summary: Fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of a barbershop waiting to get a haircut when i looked up in the sky in front of me and hovering clearly in plan sight was a silver pinball looking object as i looked at it i realized instantly it was real and not a mistake, i then said to myself " hello! come and say hello to me you beautiful thing" and the object moved to the left then to the right and instantly vanished i felt nauseous and dizzy and went into the barbershop to sit down the man who was going to cut my hair asked me if i was ok and said that i looked pale. after this sighting i had 2 more one in nevada on my way to la and the other in the ancient city of chichen itza in mexico where i captured an object or a series of objects surrounding the main pyramid when i returned home i had the photograph enlarged to the max size and kodak removed the orb and there we obvious signs of tampering and then a few months later the original picture in a frame and. the negatives disappeared out of my house and were never seen again!!!After these sightings i began having bizarre experiences and became very interested in mayan and egyptian ancient cultures as well as religious and spiritual studies i've been in counseling and therapy i have a bs in psychology and am finishing up my mba.
content.summary: It was a beautiful sunny day in the bronx i was waiting outside a barbershop for a haircut for some reason i was compelled to look up into the sky it was a sunny clear day i observed a metallic spherical object hovering in the sky in front

content.detailedDescription: I was coming from -------- practice in my dads car at after sunset, i was tired, and ten minutes ago i had seen a car accident with many police, fire, and ambulance vehicles surrounding it. i was staring at the windshield when a dark small abject that seemed far zoomed across the sky and once blinked an orange light all in less than three seconds. i knew it was a ufo. i am very interested in alien life and i research alien mingling with humans. i as excited after the ufo passed because i was looking forward to seeing a ufo. i lost sight of it when it passed the sight of the windshield and because it was so fast.
content.summary: In my dads car, fast flying dark object zooms by and blinks orange light (very fast)

content.detailedDescription: Going in through photos and saw it
content.summary: Was showing photos of possible duck lease for up coming season and saw it

content.detailedDescription: I had to use the bathroom at about 3 am when i got done i decided to go outside and smoke a cigerate.As i lit my cigarette i happened to glance to my left and out of nowhere right above my neighbors trees a bright blue orb appeared out of thin air,almost like someone turned on a switch.Thn it sat there for about 5-10 secons then glided down in behind the trees.I was completely in shock because i have seen many of fallen stars and there was no way possible that that was a star.Honestly i was scared i truly didnt know what could be coming out of those woods
content.summary: The bright blue object appeared out of nowhere then glided to the earth

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned 18 years old that summer and i began living with my eldest sister in her apartment at stonebridge golf course in maryville. living there was very secluded so occasionally i would walk to collinsville for some where and something to do. one evening in october 2002 i was walking back from collinsville. i started to star gaze while walking. as soon as i looked up i noticed straight ahead there was what i thought to be a star just a little bigger and brighter than the rest. within seconds of questioning myself on whether or not it was something else it then shifted fast to the right to the left to the right again it was gone in lightning speed. i believed then i saw a u.F.O. i didn't mention it to anybody. i felt as if it was watching me also for it to bolt from my view as soon as i looked at it still makes me wonder about the mystery. after that sighting i watched on t.V. the story about u.F.Os over southern illinois and i'm glad i can join others in saying i saw it too. the truth is out there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Felt like i was being watched.

content.detailedDescription:
Lately in lancaster, pa i have spotted black triangles in sky, close enough to see them on several occasions & i am a very credible witness as well.

about my background, i am a credited audio producer & engineer, a graduate of the institute of audio research, where one of the first things you will learn is ear training, sound levels & measurments, and more in depth audio related training. i only mention my background due to it plays a part in my knowledge of the sighting. also i am a military & air force enthusiast, i've grown up with the love of planes & with the knowledge of every plane in america's public arsenal. my father was an army ranger and taught me what to look for when spotting and identifying planes & objects in the sky.

every night i come home from my girlfriends house a little late, usually around 4-5:30am, and before i get into the house, i finish the rest of my cigarette while admiring the stars and constellations. 

the first sightings date was february 28th, 2014, the time was approximately 4:30-4:50am that early morning. i was arriving home, i just parked my car in front of my house. as i got out of the car, i relaxed on the side of the back of my car as i finished my cigarette. as i was looking in the sky to see if it was possible to spot the andromeda galaxy with the naked eye or not. i noticed a black semi transparent triangle going in a straight direction towards my house and flying way too low. the object was moving very slowly, too slow to be a plane for sure, it was flying north west to south east. the object made zero sound, which puzzled me for sure.

at first thought, i guessed it was an f-117 (a us fighter plane), or possibly a drone. but as it got closer, i knew for sure i was wrong. the object got so close to my house that it was only about 100-150 feet above my house as it flew by. if a plane, especially an f-117 was to do that, the sound would have shown for sure. in this case of the object that i've seen, the entire time there was no sound at all, no chemical trail, no engine sound, and no windows visible to me at the time.

as the object appeared above my house i was able to get a good look at it, probably as good as it will get without having the object hover or land. the object was a complete triangle, all dark black colored, no lights visible, no windows visible, and the object had about a 10 percent transparancy. when i say 10 percent transparency, i mean that it was 90 percent visible as a black figure and 10 percent see-through.

there really wasn't much to see to be honest, the object looked like it intended to blend into the night sky since there was no sound, no trail, and 10 percent transparency. 

the object flew in a south eastern direction over my house at about 100-150 feet above me in a straight direction. i did not chase the object or take any pictures or video (i don't own a phone or camera).

i've spotted this same object, the same time (4-5:30am) two more times the week after the first sighting.

sighting #2
march 4th, 2014 - same object - same details, same flight path
appox time - 4-5:30am
lancaster, pa

sighting #3
march 5th, 2014 - same object, same details, same flight path
approx time - 4-5:30am
lancaster, pa

all three sightings are the same object. it was close enough for me to identify that it was not a drone, f-117, or baloon.

i'd be happy to share any more information that i can provide you all.
content.summary: Ive spotted black triangles in lancaster, pa 3 times close up, very credible witness

content.detailedDescription: I don't have the exact date when i witnessed seeing this ufo;however, i do remember that ufos were seen from olney, il to evansville, in.  more specifically, i remember hearing that a mothership or a large ufo was seen above one of factories in evansville, in and it caused me to hear about it at the time in the town of olney in which i lived in. i believe it took place in 1997, if memory serves me correctly. also i remember hearing people telling me that they heard the air force had said they had dropped flares. what i saw was no flare. event: if you drive north from olney and take st marie road north, you will come to rave town road, where on that night myself and a friend took a right.. and we stopped on rave town bridge. there we exited the car, not seeing the ufo yet.. but upon exiting the car. a half mile to a mile down the river south, hovering just above the trees was large sphere that glowed orange and yellow. i remember we were just like what is that? that's weird etc. that was pretty much the extent of the verbatim at the time. we stood there watching the ufo for roughly 30 minutes. during this time, it never moved once, never made a sound, it was just there. after roughly 30 minutes we decided to leave not knowing what we were seeing and the friend i was with was becoming a little nervous. so we drove back the way we came, back to st marie road. i remember looking back as my friend drove, threw the back window of his car,, and it was still there, until we were out of sight of it and i could see it no more.
content.summary: Ball of light hovering right above the treeline for 30 mintues

content.detailedDescription: As i mentioned above i seen two objects in the sky diagonal of one another. at first i figured it was a star or plane until i realized they were hovering once one object slightly moved. the oddest thing was that one they were completely silent and two they gave off an amber glow.I stared for about 10 minutes then i took pictures on my cell phone. one object started to slightly move again then took off so fast into the sky, while the other stayed still. the next several nights nothing was out of the ordinary, but after about 5 days i saw the same colored objects again but this time they were spread out further and when i came back outside they were gone.
content.summary: I walked outside to move my truck from the street to the driveway and i saw 2 hovering objects

content.detailedDescription:
We went up to mt baker for the day before we left we were sliding in the snow and goofing around. mt baker is about 60 miles north east of ferndale washington. 

i was taking video of my nieces kids sliding down the hill side near where we were parked. 

when i was taking the video i did not noticed  the object until i got home to ohio an loaded my videos and pics on my lap top. when i was watching the video it caught my eye. it appears at the top right of the video in the  corner for about a second it flashes in then out.

it has the shape of what looks like a horse shoe crab and brown in color with a tail like thing off it's back and it does not look like a bird of any kind.

also in the video you will see a couple of fluttery things fly past the little girl in the video and she does not swat at them or any thing it's like she can not see them.
content.summary: Takin video at mt baker of my nices kids sliding down hill on snow object blipped in then disappeared in less then a second.

content.detailedDescription:
We were watching a movie in a friend's garage in the apartments, facing south-east.  i was watching mars and i spotted movement, two reddish dim lights. moving very fast.  

at first i figured it was a civilian aircraft.  i'm a pilot and i'm usually watching other aircraft fly. 

i kept waiting to see the flashing anticollision beacon and instead the of a red/green light, both lights were red.  very dim. 

as it flew overhead i spotted a third light, as if the craft was triangle.

the craft flew overhead much faster than the iss orbiting, heavens above report nothing in that area at the time of the sighting. 

the thing flew very quickly and made a turn so it went behind a building to the north after appearing in the eastern sky, below mars. 

having viewed numerous satellites, the object was moving far faster than a orbital object, and no noise, so if it was a jet, it was very high.  but moving far too fast for a civilian craft.
content.summary: Lights moving very fast in sky, no noise

content.detailedDescription: Glowing green changed directions dramatically object also had a red fire glow intermittentally
content.summary: Driving home and seen in the distance with green lights with a red fire glow

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving on i46e toward seguine, tx, we noticed an orange ball of light making erractic movements over our subdivision while we waited at the stoplights. we are in a flight path for civilian and military aircraft of all kinds. this orange ball of light was the size of small helicopter. i pulled over in subdivision to watch for about two minutes, then it zipped off toward se. my son then told me that as he and my foster son, that last night, march 28th, about the same time, 11pm, they both witnessed another large ball of orange light toward the nw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Myself, son driving on 46e, saw orange ball, size of helicopter erratic flying over subdivision

content.detailedDescription:
1. inside looking out the window
2. impossible to miss with twilight and cloud coverage background, extremely bright light, like a spot light pointing in our direction from far away. is wasn't blinking but pulsing erratically, no sequence or fixed frequency of pulse
3. helicopter but didn't see a tail light
4. moving very slowly east not changing altitude
5. i saw it and tried to figure out what it could be, then called my wife. she came over and also couldn't figure it out. i wanted to get my camera but didn't want to take my eyes off it. then the light went out and didn't return. whole event last at most 5 minutes
6. disappeared
content.summary: North star in our neighborhood, very very bright light pulsing then disapears

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend waiting for the bus to go back to my house, when i noticed what i believed that was a star moving very slowly. i've told my girlfriend and she confirmed that i was not just seeing things, and even pointed me out another light coming from the same south-west to west direction. 

both of them were glowing, but one had am ever changing collor that varied from orange to yellow and the other blue to white. at first, i though they where sattelites, but as soon as i told that to my girlfriend the objects had changed their direction. we've spent about 15 minutes watching the event, when the ufo extinguished its lights immediatly after reaching (far on the sky) a position over us.

i was amazed by the scene, as it's not the first time i've saw an ufo, but this time it were different. this time it were a rich experience because of its duration and the fact that when we arrived there on that afternoon i've had had felt that i was going to see something and i must have kept an eye on the sky.

porto alegre was founded aside a huge water mass called stuary guaiba, the local of sighting is in the rural area of the city and less than 10km away from the stuary. i'm almost sure that the ufo flew from there. the local of sight is also a low-populated and dark area, with no trees to disturb the vision of the sky (in fact, it's possible to sight the milky way on the sky with ease from there).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two punctiform lights that came from the horizon, sometimes hovering, sometimes changing direction then pathing.
content.locationName: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was hovering above my house abd then vanished
content.summary: It was hoverin g above my house

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch.  my wife pointed out two fire balls flying across the sky.  i took pictures of them they made no sounds.   we have seen them before on august the 8th  of 2013. the august event there were many more.
content.summary: Saw two balls of fire

content.detailedDescription: Father was driving us home from a football game less than a mile from home as we descended a hill a bright glowing red/orange orb flying at a high rate of speed flew from right to left across infront of our path at windshield hight just as we both said what was that it flew back across the road behind us my dad saw it in the rearview mirror i had actually turned around and saw it
content.summary: Flew infront of vehichel while driving from right to left then flew back across road behind vehichle  saw it in rearview mirror

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were sitting on my patio enjoying the cool night air relaxing after work. the patio to my apartment faced a small open courtyard shared by three other apartment buildings. as we were talking something caught my eye and i noticed what i initially thought was a t shirt/ plastic shopping bag fall from the second story of the building across from where i was sitting at(around 25 yards away) but how it fell and the color and size seemed way off to me. i kept talking to my friend but my full attention turned to this object because it never touched the ground and was hovering about 5-6 feet above the ground and was completely still. my friend kept talking but she quickly fell silent after noticing the object. after the object hovered for about ten seconds it started moving to and around the doors and windows of other apartments and appeared to look into the windows, as it did this it was completely motionless and still about 5 feet off the ground, except when it observed the windows of the second story windows it was around 15 foot off the ground. as this was happening i was not scared but tried to act like it was not happening because i was unsure about the capabilities of this object. the object kept floating up and down "observing" then after several minutes flew directly to where we were sitting then abruptly turned to its left (our right). i then got an excellent look at it, it was about the size of a basketball but was transparent and it resembled a human brain, and appeared to have beady eyes which looked right at me.   i then stood up in amazement and it turned and looked directly at me and raised up about a foot almost instantaneously then took off behind the building to my right, i then followed it and my friend followed behind me. i saw the object hovering about 6 feet off the ground close to the apartment buildings exterior wall as i approached. when i got 5 feet from it the object it immediately raised up to 10 feet i then reached towards it and it raised up a few more feet, i am 6'4"-6'5" and when i raise my hand all the way up its closer to 9 feet. but when i lowered my hand the object dropped in height, i then raised my hand again and it raised again i lowered my hand and it lowered. then i slowly raised my hand again and the object lowered itself allowing me to touch it for a few seconds. i felt very calm after touching the object and lowered my hand after it raised up again. my dad came outside to see what where i was and my dog was barking a lot.  it then looked at me then abruptly shot off into the sky, i watched it as long as i could until it vanished into the night sky.
content.summary: Saw unknown descend then hover , after looking at me i followed and made contact

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in our backyard playing with some of the neighborhood children and was walking toward our home.

2. i noticed a glowing object out of the corner of my eye.

3. i knew it was nothing i had ever seen before and that it was not from our planet.

4. described in detail below.

5. at first i stood silent, i was in awe of what i was witnessing. i was both amazed and excited. it was both beautiful and fascinating to watch.

6. described in detail below.

i would also like you to know that i did take the abduction survey, and although i did not fit the criteria i would not rule out the possibility of something like that happening. i was quite young (around 12) and if something like that did occur maybe they did it in a way that i have no memory of it.

below is a copy of an email i sent to mr. jan harzan describing in detail what i witnessed that evening.

hello mr. harzan,

my name is james balzer and i am completely fascinated with your show hanger 1. and after watching the "crashes and cover-ups" episode, especially the linda cortile segment of that episode i felt the need to contact you.
 when i was a child (10-13 years old, i don't quite remember exactly) i lived with my family in west bend, wisconsin. my parents had some guests over one summer evening and us children were outside playing in the yard behind our house. we lived in a quiet neighborhood outside of town so there were not any street lights or things of that nature and it was around or just after dusk so there was not any direct sunlight any more. as we were playing i noticed something out of the corner of my eye. when i looked up i could not believe my eyes. i stood frozen in disbelief as i watched what could only be a ufo (a large illuminated yellow light with an illuminated white light in the center, as i seen it) flying only a few hundred feet over our neighborhood, then directly over our house, across our backyard and over our neighbors barn, where it then pointed upward and took off out of sight at an incredible rate of speed. all without making even the slightest noise. i immediately ran inside to tell my parents, who of course dismissed it as quickly as i told them.
 years later i began getting severe headaches, and i began to get very concerned thinking i might have a blood clot, or a tumor, or some other type of medical condition seeing as though the headaches were always concentrated in the exact same spot on the base of my skull to the right of my neck. i went to see a specialist and had several tests done including a ct scan of my entire head. after future review of the results the doctor could find nothing wrong with me and could not explain my headaches, except to say it must be from physical or mental stress, or both. that is except for one tiny little thing that he couldn't explain. and i thought nothing of it until i watched the story about linda cortile this evening. the doctor said it looked as though there was a very small anomaly at the base of my skull, exactly where i told him that my headaches seem to come from. but he said it did not appear to be metal, it appeared more to be a calcium deposit in the skull or something of that nature. the headaches are not as frequent today, but i do still get them. and still in the exact same spot. and i have always wondered in the back of my mind. did i really see what i think i did? i'm 99.9% sure i did, because i can describe it like it was yesterday. but if i really did see it. could it be possible that they took me, planted a device in my skull and then brought me back without anyone ever knowing?

i may never really know. but regardless of what i or anyone else thinks about any of this. i will always believe that in all that vastness of space, we can not possibly be the only intelligent forms of life. and although we may never know. i hope that if we ever do find out someday, that it's in a peaceful manner and that we can help and learn from each other.

please continue searching for the truth.

thank you,
james balzer

and although i have no pictures or drawings of what i witnessed, i can describe the event in exact detail.
content.summary: I witnessed a ufo flying over our neighborhood when i was a child.

content.detailedDescription:
on a full moon night in august of 2003, about the 13th, at approximately 2am, i was talking on the phone while sitting on my front porch and an orb appeared. the orb was about the size of a large grapefruit. it hovered above my lawn, next to the apex of my roof, about 25 feet above the ground and about 20 feet away from me. 
 at first, i thought it was a spiritual orb until i focused on the center of it and realized it was moving in a more "mechanical" way. the orb's aura emanated light approximately 1 foot in diameter. the orb seemed to be made of glass and the light inside of it moved very rapidly in the pattern of the infinity sign. 
  the only other lights around were: the streetlights, some stars and the full moon. i remember thinking how the light of the full moon paled in comparison to this orb. i was transfixed on it. i could not look away. i have a mild form of epilepsy and usually bright lights bother me severely but the brilliance of this orb did not hurt my eyes at all.
  i am not sure exactly how long this orb hovered there. it seemed like minutes but it could have been merely seconds. i was so hypnotized by the rapidly moving light inside, time seemed to stand still. i don't remember it appearing or disappearing. at the time this happened i had absolutely no belief in aliens or ufos. i told one person about it and they dismissed it and me, so i never spoke of it again until years later.
content.summary: Glowing glass orb, very bright, light inside moved in the infinity sign pattern, extremely bright aura on outside about a foot.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were stopped at a red light along i-10 east frwy and n. wayside dr. headed sw when we noticed an orb light located close to the sun. we thought it was a rainbow being rejected with light from the sun. he then began to take pictures when the light started to reflect and flutter slowly. it looked almost transparent but covered amidst an array of rainbow lights. i got an eerie feeling as if we were being watched and studied. it just hovered. not long after we began to see white streams of jet lines in the sky just adjacent to where the light was. there was a series of white cloud lines on a crystal clear day. the orb was in clear view of the public because the person in the car next to us looked at what we were looking at and began taking pictures too. when the light changed we proceeded onto the frwy and drove toward the sunlight. i think the jets scared it away.
content.summary: Orb disc sighted near i-10 e. in houston texas

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a southwest flight from denver to los angeles, flying over northern las vegas desert looking out the window.  the lights were extremely bright and incredibly large,it would be hard to miss.  my first thought was ufo's.
the only reason that i knew this was north las vegas is because my cell 
phone tagged it to that location. i'm sure that anyone looking out the window on my side of the plane would have seen it!
content.summary: On a flight, seen from the plane, looking down at desert floor, n las vegas

content.detailedDescription:
When: 1967, june (day unknown)
where: big sur coastal highway, near lucia, ca, parked in a highway 1 mountain-side pullout, about 500 feet above the ocean.

up to now, i was a hard-nosed skeptic concerning ufos.  i believed air force investigations that had ���proven��� all ufo sightings had either been hoaxes or natural phenomena, and reputable scientists had concurred.

around 3:30 a.M., as i was dozing off to sleep in the rear of our van, an unusual low-pitched, pulsing, hum caught my attention.  at first i thought it was a freight train in the distance.  then i realized that the nearest railroad tracks were located in the salinas valley, along the east side of the santa lucia mountain range.  furthermore, the pitch of the hum was a bit too high to be that of a distant train, and too low to be that of any aircraft i had ever heard.  as an aviation enthusiast and licensed private pilot, i had developed a keen ear for aircraft engine sounds, and could identify many airplanes by sound alone.

climbing out of the rear of our van, my wife and i  immediately observed that the low-pitched hum was emanating from a white glowing disk-shaped object a half mile south of us.  initially, the object emerged from a narrow canyon that opened onto a small beach.  then the disk slowly climbed towards the ocean.  for the first minute or two, the craft was only a few feet above the beach and slowly ascending, with small yellow flames randomly erupting several places along the bottom of its large glowing disk.  soon after igniting, the burning objects fell off the bottom of the craft and hit the ground, sometimes with a burst of sparks upon impact before flickering out.  as the craft continued its slow climb, fewer flames erupted and fell off the craft.  by the time the craft was about 200 feet (70 meters) high, the last of the flammable debris had ignited and fallen into the ocean.  it appeared that this debris was ground vegetation that had been adhering to the bottom of the craft, for the flames had the same yellow-orange color and flicker as burning brush.

the lack of a nearby reference made it difficult to determine size, but we estimated the disk to be approximately 150 feet long and 25 feet thick in the center.  this mysterious object had the same appearance and sound of ufos in hollywood movies such as the day the earth stood still.

by this point, we had four observers; two friends in the front seats (tom and mary), my wife (kathleen), and  me.  i knocked on the two cars parked beside us, disturbing both partially-dressed couples who were making love, oblivious to the excitement outside.  tom and i also flagged down a motorist, so we now had nine witnesses.  in amazement, all of us kept our eyes glued to the slow flight of the ufo.

  once the glowing disk was above the ocean, it changed direction and began moving directly towards us at a slowly accelerating speed.  the hum grew louder and slightly higher in pitch as it approached us, and the glow of the craft illuminated the nearby mountainside.

when the ufo was several hundred feet away and still slowly flying directly towards us, six of our observers scrambled in terror into a gully on the other side of the road to hide.  by now, the ufo was illuminating the three of us who did not flee.  feeling intense fear, my instinct was to run and hide, but the ���scientific observer��� in me made me stay where i was, well, almost.  i did back up across the road, along with tom and the driver we had stopped.  as the large ufo came along side and level with us, the surrounding area was illuminated enough by the glow of the craft to cast our shadows on the cliff face behind us.  the glow made the area almost as bright as daylight, but with the monochromatic illumination of a full moon.  the throbbing hum became faster, louder, and higher in pitch as the speed of the disk slowly increased.

when the glowing ufo was abreast of us and a couple hundred feet away, tom exclaimed, ���come take me with you!���  his cry put my nerves more on edge as i did not want to catch the attention of the ufo crew, who were close enough to hear tom.  even at this close distance, the outline of the object was indistinct and fuzzy.  as the disk passed by us, the white glow transformed into a faint yellow hue.  the loud hum also continued to increase in pitch in proportion to the increasing speed of the craft.  the faint yellow glow of the craft smoothly transitioned to deep yellow, then to orange, and finally to deep red just before it flew out of sight.  after passing us, the acceleration of the ufo became exponential, increasing at an ever faster rate, once it began an upward-curving flight path.  it was flying almost straight up at an extremely fast speed when it finally became too small to see.

this experience left us all in shock.  repeatedly, we went over the details, finding it hard to believe our senses and needing confirmation that we had not been hallucinating or dreaming.  when the ufo was only a few hundred feet from us, we were all filled with an intense tingling, visceral terror that was out of proportion to the experience.  we literally felt our hair stand on end.  the three of us who remained in the open agreed that it took all our strength to resist sensations of terror and not run and hide with the others in the gully.

i strongly suspect that the physical sensations we felt were related to a strong electromagnetic field coming from the propulsion system.  this suspicion was validated in 1984 when i briefly worked in a small metal transmitter room at the base of a broadcast tower.  the room was filled with powerful tv and radio broadcasting transmitters and multi-thousand-watt power-supply transformers that created a loud hum from the extremely strong electromagnetic fields they generated.  upon entering this room, i felt my hair tingle, and i experienced an anxiety-producing visceral sensation that reminded me of the similar but more powerful feelings i had experienced when the ufo flew near me.

the morning after our ufo sighting, i called the local flight service station to see if there had been any notams (notice to airmen) or unusual pilot reports in the big sur area.  there were none.  whenever the military conducted exercises or experiments they always issued notams in order to close their airspace to civilian air traffic.  fort hunter-liggett, a military training base, is on the east side and a bit south of the coastal mountains we were on.

later that day we met a hippie who had been camped on the beach south of the ufo takeoff.  he, too, had been awakened by the loud hum coming from the craft, which he saw take off a few hundred feet from his campsite.  his description of events concurred with our observations.

the above account was written when my wife and i returned home from our vacation so we could share our experience with our friends, and capture details of the event while it was still fresh in our mind.

howard sodja
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A white glowing, humming disk-shaped object on a beach rose, hovered, and flew within 200 feet by us, changing colors as it accelerated.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in the middle of dec. 2013 at about 10;00pm. i was looking at the waterway to the east of my house and notice a bright light on the hillside about a mile away. the light got bigger and brighter. it started about the size of a baseball and when it stop it was about the size of a basketball if you held them at arms lenth. then it stayed there for a few minutes and went straight up till it was gone. that took about 2 sec. at first i thought it was a helicopter then when it left it was way to fast.
content.summary: I saw a large ball of light. it hovered then went straight up

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east bound on the 91 freeway at just after 9:00 pm on march 28, 2014. noticed strange pattern of lights in the anaheim hills area just minutes before 5.1 earthquake. there were also 2 helicopters and one very low flying plane in the same vicinity. this is the pattern of lights that i saw. they did not move.




      .
                                                                  .

                          .

      .                                                          

                                                                  .
   


                                                 .

 





                          .   




there were 3 sets two on each side of a triangle formation.
please feel free to contact me with any questions. thank you.
content.summary: Not much to describe was viewed at a distance.

content.detailedDescription: The craft was dead silent. i only knew about it after i opened my eyes that had been closed for at least 15 minutes. i saw three lights. two streaks of orange and the one red circular light in the middle was pulsating slowly. i was in my back yard. it passed directly over my head very slowly. it was about the speed of a helicopter but it made no sound. i'm used to seeing helicopters fly over and i know what they sound like. it passed over my head and cleared the trees. i was so dumbfounded that i began meditating again and asked for the craft to do another fly over my head if this was in fact real. after i did that for a few seconds, the craft turned around and headed directly over my head again. it came from the north and went south. then it came from the south and went north. no sounds. i had a feeling of joy as if i had actually communicated to a being in the craft. it confirmed the reality to me when the craft reversed and came literally straight over my head. i at first thought it was a plane because of the red flashing light but i didn't hear any noise and i've never seen an airplane with two rectangular orange beams of light that were at least 6 times the size of the red flashing orb. i have extensive knowledge of military and civilian aircraft. the rectangle orange aligned north to south almost sandwiching the red light. there was distance between all the lights and i could not see anything behind the lights but i felt as thought there was a large unlit craft. it moved too slow to be any sort of modern air plane.
content.summary: I asked for the appearance (with respect) to occur and i opened my eyes to it coming over my head.
